    Prevalence of hypertension, JNC7 definition

    prev_htn_jnc7.Rmd
    library(cardioStatsUSA)

    Hypertension (JNC7 guideline definition)

    Prevalence by calendar year. 

    nhanes_visualize(outcome = 'htn_jnc7', 
                 years = 'all')[[1]]

    Prevalence by age group in 2017-2020. 

    nhanes_visualize(outcome = 'htn_jnc7',
                 exposure = 'demo_age_cat',
                 years = 'most_recent')[[1]]

    Prevalence by sex in 2017-2020. 

    nhanes_visualize(outcome = 'htn_jnc7',
                 exposure = 'demo_gender',
                 years = 'most_recent')[[1]]

    Prevalence by race/ethnicity in 2017-2020. 

    nhanes_visualize(outcome = 'htn_jnc7',
                 exposure = 'demo_race',
                 years = 'most_recent')[[1]]
